summary: Ever wish your Gold/Coins in-game were actually Dogecoin? Look no further, this is the mod for you.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]Ever wish your coins in-game were actually Dogecoins? Look no further, this is the mod for you.[/size]

[size=3]Lore UnFriendly coin replacer. Replaces coins with Dogecoins, the worlds funnest Cryptocurrency. [/size]

[size=6]Features:[/size]
[list]
[*]1024x2048 sized textures. 

[*]Doge

[*]Realistic coin styling

[/list][/font]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/SMR3Ext.png[/img]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=6]Installation:
[/size][size=3]Just extract folder to your Skyrim installation folder and enjoy your new currency.[/size]

[size=6]Uninstallation:
[/size][size=3]Just navigate to your Skyrim/Data/Textures/Clutter folder and delete [/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]coin01.dds and coin01_n.dds and your coins will be back to default. Simple as that.[/size][/font]
author: TCollier31

files.name: Dogecoin Coin Replacer 0.9
files.changelogHtml:
Added Heads side to coin
Updated Normal Map
